availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel B. Calvert (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Son of John T. Calvert and Frances Morse Calvert. Married to Mary P. Calvert. Father of Sarah P. Calvert. Married to Martha Ann Cravens in Caldwell County, Kentucky on January 25, 1855. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Employed Pinickney Brown and John Morse as laborers in Caldwell County in 1850. Killed by James Williams in Caldwell County on March 2, 1858.
